\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

   % https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& {M'} \&\&\& {C_{i+1}^-M'} \\
	k \& k \&\& 0 \& k \\
	\& {\cdots } \&\&\& \cdots
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[shorten <=10pt, shorten >=10pt, Rightarrow, dashed, from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[shift left=3, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[shift right=3, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[shift left=3, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[shift right=3, from=2-5, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
   \end{document}
